Name: Tarte Au Pommes
Ingredients: 30 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
15 ml Joseph Cartron Double Crème de Cassis de Bourgogne
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Review: Rich in flavour and well balanced.
History: Created in 2001 by Jamie Stephenson at The Lock, Manchester, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Tarte Au Pommes contains 232 calories
